product_name: Rocky Mounts Euro PitchFork Rooftop Bike Mount
long_description: The Rocky Mounts Euro PitchFork Rooftop bike mount is built specifically to fit Thule Aero Blade bars, Whispbar by Yakima bars and the slotted crossbars found on European cars. 45 in. long tray accommodates long wheelbases found on 29'ers and full-suspension bikes; works with the skinniest of road tires and mountain bike tires up to 2.7 in. wide. Remove front tire and secure in fork block, which fits all disc brake/suspension fork combinations with standard 9mm axles. Quick-release skewer design with 9mm of closure is lockable and easy to use; back tire attaches to wheel tray with easy-to-use nylon ratchet strap. Durable stainless-steel, low-profile head and full-length tubular aluminum wheel tray provide years of hassle-free use. Fits bikes with or without disc brakes. Can be locked with Rocky Mounts lock cores, sold separately.
short_description: The Rocky Mounts Euro PitchFork Rooftop bike mount is built specifically to fit Thule Aero Blade bars, Whispbar by Yakima bars and the slotted crossbars found on European cars.
